markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sewer Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3125)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These amorphous masses of sewage and other detritus make their way through filthy culverts beneath cities large and small.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Sewer Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3125)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Ooze" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=665" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 256 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +3; motion sense ([precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411)) 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +1

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** -5

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Motion Sense** A sewer ooze can feel nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 8 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +1 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524), bleed, critical hits, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pseudopod +9,
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning plus 1d4 acid

**Filth Wave** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** The sewer ooze unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures in a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 17 Reflex save or take 1d4 acid damage and take a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88)). A creature can spend an Interact action to clean someone off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-453" />
name: Sewer Ooze

text: Sewer Ooze These amorphous masses of sewage and other detritus make their way through filthy culverts beneath cities large and small. Recall Knowledge - Ooze (Occultism): DC 15 Unspecific Lore : DC 13 Specific Lore : DC 10 Sewer Ooze Source Monster Core pg. 256 1.1 Perception +3; motion sense (precise) 60 feet, no vision Languages Skills Stealth +1 Str +2 Dex -5 Con +4 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -5 Motion Sense A sewer ooze can feel nearby motion through vibration and air movement. --- AC 8 Fort +9 Ref +1 Will +3 HP 40 Immunities acid, bleed, critical hits, mental, precision, unconscious, visual --- Speed 10 feet Melee Single Action pseudopod +9, Damage 1d6+1 bludgeoning plus 1d4 acid Filth Wave Single Action Frequency once per minute; Effect The sewer ooze unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures in a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 17 Reflex save or take 1d4 acid damage and take a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls prone). A creature can spend an Interact action to clean someone off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action.
